ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( Account_Location_State__c = "Alaska", Account_Location_State__c = "Colorado", Account_Location_State__c = "Florida", Account_Location_State__c = "Indiana", Account_Location_State__c = "Massachusetts", Account_Location_State__c = "Michigan", Account_Location_State__c = "New Hampshire", Account_Location_State__c = "North Carolina", Account_Location_State__c = "North Dakota", Account_Location_State__c = "Oregon", Account_Location_State__c = "Rhode Island", Account_Location_State__c = "Tennessee", Account_Location_State__c = "West Virginia" ), NOT( FS_Fees__c = 0 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: FS Fees must be 0 in this state
